mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM resv_room WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND (DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{datepickerS} AND #{datepickerE})

SELECT id, room_id, DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_in, DATE_FORMAT(check_out, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_out, exbed, meal, DATE_FORMAT(resv_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as resv_date, member_id, hotel_category FROM resv_room WHERE member_id=#{memberId}

SELECT resv_room.id as id, resv_room.hotel_category as hotel_category, DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_in, DATE_FORMAT(check_out, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_out, room_type FROM resv_room INNER JOIN room ON room.id=resv_room.room_id WHERE member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT resv_room.id as id, resv_room.hotel_category as hotel_category, DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_in, DATE_FORMAT(check_out, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_out, room_type FROM resv_room INNER JOIN room ON room.id=resv_room.room_id WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND (check_in BETWEEN #{datepickerS} AND #{datepickerE}) ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT resv_room.id as id, room_type, bed_type, room_price, room.hotel_category as hotel_category, DATE_FORMAT(check_in, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_in, DATE_FORMAT(check_out, '%Y-%m-%d') as check_out, DATE_FORMAT(resv_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as resv_date, ppl_ad, ppl_ch, ppl_bb, resv_room.exbed, resv_room.meal, card_no, card_yy, card_mm, card_type, detail FROM resv_room INNER JOIN room ON room.id=resv_room.room_id INNER JOIN resv_guest ON resv_room.id=resv_guest.resv_room_id WHERE resv_room.id=#{id}
